sentences.en: Changes in technology may mean that once-valued skills are now redundant.
sentences.cn: 技术上的革新可能意味着曾经被重视的技术现在已变得多余。

sentences.en: Five of the company's senior managers have been made compulsorily redundant.
sentences.cn: 公司的高级经理中有5位已经被强制性地裁掉。

sentences.en: He was made redundant and now he's trying to pull himself up again.
sentences.cn: 他之前作为冗员被裁，现在他正试图再一次奋发图强。

sentences.en: My job is at risk, ie I may be made redundant.
sentences.cn: 我的工作保不住了(我遭受到裁减的危险).

sentences.en: Nearly all the redundant worker have been absorbed into other departments.
sentences.cn: 几乎所有冗员,都已调往其他部门任职.

sentences.en: Seventy factory workers were made redundant in the resulting cuts.
sentences.cn: 在继而发生的裁员中，70名工厂工人被解雇。

sentences.en: Seventy men at the factory were redundant because of falling demand for our products.
sentences.cn: 由于对我们产品需求的减少,工厂里有70人被辞退了.

sentences.en: Skills which have been made redundant by technological advance.
sentences.cn: 由于技术进步而变得多余的技术.

sentences.en: The company is caught in a double bind. If it doesn't modernize it won't make money, but if it does modernize they'll have to make people redundant because they won't need them any more.
sentences.cn: 这家公司进退两难. 不实行现代化就无法盈利, 要实行现代化就会有冗员,因为公司将不再需要他们.

sentences.en: The jobs have been made redundant by technological advance.
sentences.cn: 这些职业工种因技术的发展而变得多余.

sentences.en: There are too many redundant words in this book.
sentences.cn: 这本书里多余的词太多.

sentences.en: There will be no question of anyone being made redundant.
These statements are thus redundant but they must be self - consistent.
sentences.cn: 这样列出的式子是多余的,但这些式子必须是不自相矛盾的.

sentences.en: This word is redundant, it can be left out.
sentences.cn: 这个字是多余的, 可以去掉.

sentences.en: to be made redundant from your job
When a company keeps making people redundant, those who are left behind might start looking over their shoulder.
sentences.cn: 当一家公司不停地裁员时，那些留下来的员工也会开始惴惴不安了。

words.tran_cn: [计]多余的，过剩的；被解雇的，失业的；冗长的，累赘的

trans.tran_cn: 多余的，累赘的，（因人员过剩）被解雇的，失业的，重沓，衍
trans.tran_en: if you are redundant, your employer no longer has a job for you
